del_triggers.regex: Ha, brilliant! Look at those dolerite inclusions, simply beautiful\. Here, have these\. It occurs to me you might have preferred this before acquiring these samples, but look at these extrusive patterns!

triggers.regex: Monumenta Quests: Finding the starting NPC for Unveiled\.

del_triggers.regex: Unveiled: Work with Josiah on the magic to learn how to infiltrate the Sons of the Forest's fortress\.

triggers.regex: Unveiled: Work with Josiah on the magic to learn how to infiltrate the Sons of the Forest's fortress\.

del_triggers.regex: Mistleaves and a Wand of Blood! Just what I needed\. Now\.\.\. the thing with a Mistleaf Hood is that they can only be put on your head once, if you take them off they lose their shape and can't be worn anymore\. I'll make a bunch, so let me know when you want one. Until then, you should check back in with Haynes, I think she has a plan\.

triggers.regex: Monumenta Quests: Finding the teleporter to the starting NPC for Tlaxan Troubles\.

del_triggers.regex: \[T'Lm\] I see you have claimed the Magenta Wool\. Well done\.

triggers.regex: \[T'Lm\] Now, head back within the ruins of Velara\. There is a side passage containing a cauldron\. If you place water into the Cauldron, you will find the sacred herbs\. Each time you add water, you will receive one herb\. Be sure to bring water with you!
